channel.title: Softlayer_billing_item_network_storage_hub on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_billing_item_network_storage_hub on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Network_Storage_Hub
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Network_Storage_Hub Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Network_Storage_Hub models all billing items related to hub-based StorageLayer offerings, such as CloudLayer storage. Local allowCancellationFlag Flag to check if a billing item can be cancelled. 1 = yes. 0 = no. Type: integer associatedBillingItemId This is sometimes populated for orphan billing items that are not attached to servers. Billing items like secondary portable IP addresses fit into this category.
